Andy Serkis hingga Colin Farrell Diincar Film 'The Batman'
06 Nov 2019, 11:52 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Aktor Andy Serkis, Colin Farrell, hingga Matthew McConaughey tengah dalam perbincangan gabung film 'The Batman'. (Ore Huiying/Getty Images for Netflix)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Aktor Andy SerkisÂ tengah dalam perbincangan gabung film The Batman. Ia menjadi aktor selanjutnya dalam pekan ini yang dikaitkan dengan The Batman setelah aktor Matthew McConaughey.Dikabarkan Aceshowbiz, Serkis diproyeksikan untuk memerankan karakter Alfred Pennyworth. Karakter itu merupakan pelayan yang sangat setia kepada keluarga Wayne.Setelah kedua orang tua Bruce Wayne meninggal, Alfred dipercaya menjaga Bruce hingga dewasa. Bukan sekadar menjadi pelayan, bahkan Alfred juga melayani Bruce saat beraksi menjadi Batman.Karakter Alfred Pennyworth hampir selalu muncul dalam kisah Batman, baik itu film, serial televisi, animasi, maupun komik. Namun asal-usul Alfred masih misterius.Bila jadi bergabung, The Batman akan menjadi kerja sama ketiga kali antara Serkis dengan Matt Reeves sebagai sutradara. Sebelumnya mereka bekerja sama dalam Dawn of the Planet of the Apes (2014) dan War for the Planet of the Apes (2017).Selain Serkis, aktor Colin Farrell juga dalam perbincangan gabung The Batman. Farrell diproyeksikan memerankan karakter penjahat bernama Oswald Chesterfield Cobblepot alias The Penguin.Melansir Aceshowbiz, The Batman akan menjadi film terbaru setelah Batman era Christian Bale dan Ben Affleck. Karakter Bruce Wayne alias Batman akan diperankan oleh Robert Pattinson.


Aktor Colin Farrell juga dalam perbincangan gabung

Sebelumnya aktor yang dikabarkan akan bergabung The Batman adalah Matthew McConaughey. Aktor yang dikenal berperan sebagai Cooper dalam film Interstellar ini akan memerankan Harvey Dent.Dalam komik dan beberapa film Batman yang lalu, Harvey Dent diceritakan sebagai jaksa wilayah. Akibat suatu kejadian setengah kulit wajahnya hilang. Sejak itu ia berubah menjadi penjahat dengan julukan Two Face.Harvey Dent sudah tiga kali muncul dalam film. Yaitu pada film Batman (1989) yang diperankan Billy Dee Williams, pada film Batman Forever (1995) diperankan Tommy Lee Jones dan pada The Dark Knight (2008) diperankan Aaron Eckhart.Pada Oktober lalu, aktris Zoe Kravitz terpilih memerankan Catwoman dalam film The Batman. Sebelum ia terpilih sempat muncul nama Zazie Beetz, Eiza Gonzalez dan Alicia Vikander sebagai kandidat pemeran Catwoman.The Batman akan disutradarai oleh Matt Reeves. Ia juga berperan sebagai penulis naskah, dibantu Mattson Tomlin yang sebelumnya menulis The Projectionist (2008).Belum ada pengumuman resmi tentang produksi film ini, tapi sumber dalam proyek ini mengatakan kepada Variety bahwa syuting dimulai pada akhir 2019 atau awal 2020. The Batman dijadwalkan rilis Juni 2021. (adp/end)

Andy Serkis to Colin Farrell Targeted by the film 'The Batman'
Nov 6 2019, 11:52 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Actor Andy Serkis, Colin Farrell, to Matthew McConaughey are in the midst of a conversation joining the film 'The Batman'. (Ore Huiying / Getty Images for Netflix)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Actor Andy Serkis is in the middle of a discussion to join the film The Batman. He became the next actor this week to be associated with The Batman after actor Matthew McConaughey. Reported that Aceshowbiz, Serkis was projected to portray the character of Alfred Pennyworth. The character is a servant who is very loyal to the Wayne family. After Bruce Wayne's parents died, Alfred is believed to look after Bruce until adulthood. Not just being a servant, even Alfred also serves Bruce when acting as Batman. Alfred Pennyworth's character almost always appears in the story of Batman, be it movies, television series, animation, or comics. However, Alfred's origins are still mysterious. When he joins, The Batman will be the third collaboration between Serkis and Matt Reeves as director. Previously they worked together on Dawn of the Planet of the Apes (2014) and War for the Planet of the Apes (2017). Besides Serkis, actor Colin Farrell was also in the discussion to join The Batman. Farrell is projected to play a villain character named Oswald Chesterfield Cobblepot aka The Penguin. Launching Aceshowbiz, The Batman will be the latest film after Batman era Christian Bale and Ben Affleck. The character Bruce Wayne aka Batman will be played by Robert Pattinson.


Actor Colin Farrell is also in the merging conversation

Previously the actor who is rumored to be joining The Batman is Matthew McConaughey. The actor who is known to play the role of Cooper in the film Interstellar will play Harvey Dent. In the comics and several Batman films ago, Harvey Dent was told as a district attorney. As a result of an incident half the skin on his face disappeared. Since then he turned into a villain with the nickname Two Face. Harvey Dent has appeared three times in the film. Namely in the film Batman (1989) played by Billy Dee Williams, in the film Batman Forever (1995) played by Tommy Lee Jones and in The Dark Knight (2008) played by Aaron Eckhart. In October, actress Zoe Kravitz was chosen to play Catwoman in the film The Batman . Before he was elected, Zazie Beetz, Eiza Gonzalez and Alicia Vikander as Catwoman.The Batman cast candidates will be directed by Matt Reeves. He also played the role of screenwriter, assisted by Mattson Tomlin who previously wrote The Projectionist (2008). There has been no official announcement about the production of this film, but sources in this project told Variety that filming began in late 2019 or early 2020. The Batman is scheduled for release June 2021. (adp / end)
